snippet: West Bromwich Albion striker Victor Anichebe is leaving the Premier League club after nearly three years at The Hawthorns, he said on Monday....

lead_paragraph: West Bromwich Albion striker Victor Anichebe is leaving the Premier League club after nearly three years at The Hawthorns, he said on Monday.

snippet: Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho's attitude towards Henrikh Mkhitaryan seems to have thawed after the playmaker chose a sub-zero night in Ukraine on Thursday to score a dazzling first goal for the club....

snippet: Manchester City fans were probably still discussing the wisdom of Pep Guardiola leaving out John Stones when their central defence was sliced open by Arsenal forward Alexis Sanchez's precise pass for Theo Walcott's fifth-minute opener....

snippet: Leicester City striker Jamie Vardy has given the Premier League champions further encouragement that he will stay with them next season by saying he is happy at the club....

snippet: Italian Gianfranco Zola has been tasked with steering Birmingham City back into the Premier League after signing a two-and-a-half year contract to manage the English championship club....
lead_paragraph: Italian Gianfranco Zola has been tasked with steering Birmingham City back into the Premier League after signing a two-and-a-half year contract to manage the English championship club.

snippet: Chelsea captain John Terry is a major doubt for their Champions League last 16 first leg against Paris St Germain on Tuesday after going off injured in his side's 5-1 thrashing of Newcastle United in the Premier League on Saturday....

lead_paragraph: Chelsea captain John Terry is a major doubt for their Champions League last 16 first leg against Paris St Germain on Tuesday after going off injured in his side's 5-1 thrashing of Newcastle United in the Premier League on Saturday.

snippet: Leicester City face the latest challenge of Claudio Ranieri's remarkable managerial reign on Saturday, to come back down to earth from the high of a Champions League win for a domestic game against Burnley....

snippet: Sunderland striker Jermain Defoe is revelling in the pressure that comes from being the man whose goals are expected to save David Moyes' side from relegation....

snippet: An injury to influential striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic will be disastrous for Manchester United, according to manager Jose Mourinho, who is willing to let winger Memphis Depay leave in January for the right price....

headline.main: Ibrahimovic Injury Would Be a 'Disaster' for Man United-Mourinho
headline.print_headline: Ibrahimovic Injury Would Be a 'Disaster' for Man United-Mourinho

lead_paragraph: An injury to influential striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic will be disastrous for Manchester United, according to manager Jose Mourinho, who is willing to let winger Memphis Depay leave in January for the right price.
